Text:
So, essentially, nobody can create a torrent with the words "new music playlist" at the end of the name without TPB somehow truncating it to "musiaylist". I tried it a few minutes ago and paid VERY close attention and it happened again. 

MUSIAYLIST.

Bizarre.

So here it is finally. Hope you all like it. I just spent a lot of sweat on just upping the fucker. lol
Thanks MMusic and jump4joy913! Glad you like 'em.
@lytic I'll do my best not to. :) Thanks.
